title: Skin diseases detection
description: It is built using tensorflow for model creation,training and django framework it is trained on 8 classes of diseases. This project detects diseases and gemini LLM is integrated to produce enhanced information about the diseases.

title: Email spam detection
description: Built a nlp model to detect email spam .utilized Naive Bayes classifier and TF-IDF features for text analysis .Achieved high accuracy in classifying spam and non-spam messages.and configured using streamlit.

title: Watch store website
description: Developed Ecommerce website using MERN stack .The website is for watch stores with advanced features such as filters, secure authentication, and checkout process.
